thread.section_title: Courtyard New York Manhattan/Times Square West - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location and staff
thread.title_full: Great location and staff - Review of Courtyard New York Manhattan/Times Square West, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: David R
title: Great location and staff
text: This hotel does exactly what it promises in a friendly and efficient manner. The rooms are small enough but have every comfort available. The staff are well trained and provide excellent customer service. Within walking distance of Penn station which provides easy subway access to all of Manhattan and beyond. You can also get a Long Island Rail Road package to the Tanger shopping outlet in Deerpark Long Island. If you are a shopper this is not to be missed. Many of the big apple attractions are within easy walking distance such as the Empire State Building, Rockerfeller centre, Intrepid Sea, Air, and Space museum (my favourite).
